name: vscode-debug-webhook
description: Sends a webhook notification when debug session pauses or ends.

debugWebhook.url.description: The webhook URL to call on debug events.

debugWebhook.ignoreStepEvents.description: Whether to ignore 'step' events (stepping over/into code) to avoid spam.

debugWebhook.notifyTerminalCommands.description: Whether to send a notification when a terminal command finishes.

debugWebhook.commandFilterRegex.description: Regex pattern to allow terminal commands (e.g., '^python' to only match python commands). If set, only matching commands are notified.

debugWebhook.ignoreCommandRegex.description: Regex pattern to IGNORE terminal commands (e.g., '^zellij' to ignore zellij sessions). Commands matching this will NOT trigger notifications.

debugWebhook.notifyCommandSuccess.description: Whether to send a notification when a terminal command finishes successfully (exit code 0).

debugWebhook.notifyWhenFocused.description: Whether to send terminal/debug notifications even when VS Code window is focused. Default: false.
